Name: IJwit
Description: A classic wheat beer from Brouwerij 't IJ, known for its refreshing and slightly cloudy character.

Name: Mokums Overdreven IJwit
Description: A special edition of the classic IJwit with enhanced flavors.

Name: Skuumkoppe
Description: A dark wheat beer with a smooth and full-bodied taste.

Name: Mannenliefde
Description: A saison with lemongrass and Szechuan pepper, offering a unique and spicy flavor profile.

Name: PaasIJ
Description: A dark blonde spring beer with subtle hints of spice, fruit, coriander, yeast, and hops, leading to a lightly tingling finish with a long-lasting, refreshing aftertaste.

Name: Guinness Draught
Description: A traditional Irish stout with a deep color and caramelized flavor, known for its dense, creamy head achieved by mixing the beer with nitrogen.

Name: Heineken
Description: A 5% ABV euro pale lager, made by Heineken International since 1873, known for its purified water, malted barley, hops, and yeast.

Name: Tripel Karmeliet
Description: A Belgian tripel brewed to an authentic beer recipe from 1679, using three kinds of grain: wheat, oats, and barley.

Name: La Chouffe Blonde
Description: A golden beer with a slight hoppy taste, combining notes of fresh coriander and fruity tones.

Name: Stella Artois
Description: A premium lager first brewed as a Christmas beer in Leuven, known for its full flavor and clean crisp taste.

Name: Desperados Original
Description: Desperados is the world's first Tequila Flavoured Beer. A distinctive combination of full bodied lager with a kick of Tequila flavour. A light & refreshing taste profile balanced with spicy and lemony notes for sweetness.

Name: Dubbelbock
Description: Brand Dubbelbock dankt zijn rijke en robuuste smaak aan de dubbele rijping. De bijzondere blend van gebrande moutsoorten geeft Dubbelbock een prachtige, robijnrode kleur. Door zijn krachtige, moutige karakter is het een echt herfstbier.

Name: Bockbier
Description: Hertog Jan Bockbier has a pronounced full and creamy flavor, in which a slight whisp of caramel can be found. Traditionally brewed to mark the start of autumn, it was the first Dutch bock to use top fermentation.

Name: Gulpener Herfstbock
Description: Als de herfstbladeren vallen, is het tijd voor onze Gulpener Herfstbock. Rond en uitgebalanceerd door de perfecte combinatie van bitter en zoet. Intens complex, met tonen van ingekookte fruitstroop en kruiden.

Name: Christmas Ale
Description: St.Bernardus Christmas Ale is a dark seasonal beer brewed in the classic Quadrupel style. It features a full body, notes of aniseed, caramel, chestnuts, dried fruit and chocolate, and evokes cozy winter and festive aromas.

Name: Gulpener
Description: Dit bier mag je met recht een premium pilsner noemen. Toegankelijk en toch karaktervol, met een subtiele hopsmaak die precies de juiste hoeveelheid bitterheid geeft. Aangenaam verfrissend door natuurzuiver mout.

Name: Hertog Jan Pilsener
Description: Hertog Jan Pilsener has been made with love for beer from soft water from the Eiffel and the Ardennes and carefully selected hops and malts. This makes Hertog Jan Pilsener a firm, golden blonde beer. With a nice, dense head, a full flavor and a pleasantly bitter aftertaste.

Name: Cara Pils
Description: A budget-friendly Belgian pilsner brewed by the Colruyt Group, known for its light, neutral flavor profile and easy drinkability.

Name: Cristal
Description: One of the oldest surviving brands from CCU's portfolio. Started as a Pilsner but transformed into an American-style Lager in the mid-80s to reduce production costs. Light, crisp, and designed for mass-market appeal.

Name: Uiltje Wit
Description: A refreshing Belgian-style witbier with notes of citrus and spice, brewed by Uiltje Brewing Company.

Name: The Wit Special
Description: A wheat beer with a smooth, creamy texture and subtle notes of sweetness, offering a unique twist on the traditional witbier.

Name: Wijnhaven Wit
Description: A witbier with fruity, fresh, citrusy notes, making it a refreshing choice for warm days.

Name: The Mangolorian
Description: A fruited wheat beer infused with mango, offering a tropical twist and a refreshing taste.

Name: Mad Elf
Description: A Belgian-style ale brewed with honey and cherries, offering a nuanced blend of sweet and tart flavors.

Name: Best Brown Ale
Description: A smooth, toasty brown ale with hints of caramel and cocoa, making it a mainstay in the fall and winter lineup.

Name: Bifrost Winter Ale
Description: A bold winter ale with a hearty malt character balanced by a pleasant hop bitterness, named after the mythical bridge from Norse mythology.

Name: Old Freddy Walker
Description: A rich and full-bodied ale with complex flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and coffee, perfect for winter evenings.

Name: Winter Welcome Ale
Description: A limited edition seasonal beer brewed for the short days and long nights of winter, offering a full-bodied taste with a rich, malty backbone.

Name: Hop Crisis
Description: An imperial IPA with an intense hop character balanced by a robust malt backbone, offering flavors of citrus and pine.

Name: Oatmeal Stout
Description: A full-bodied black stout with a good mouthfeel, featuring dark malts that provide toffee and caramel tones.
